title: Voyage of the Yes (1973, Drama) Desi Arnaz Jr., Mike Evans, Beverly Garland | Movie

sources.title: Voyage of the Yes (1973, Drama) Desi Arnaz Jr., Mike Evans, Beverly Garland | Movie
sources.description:
Beyond the Horizon: Sail into Adventure and Self-Discovery. 
Two teenagers named Cal & Orlando, set out on a 2000-mile sailboat journey from California to Hawaii and en route combat the natural challenges and their inner shortcomings.

Original title: Voyage of the Yes (1973)

This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Lee H. Katzin
Writer: Bill Stratton
Stars: Desi Arnaz Jr., Mike Evans, Beverly Garland
Genre: Drama, Made for TV movie


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
00:03 Family dynamics and decision-making regarding a sailing trip to Hawaii.
07:28 Adventure on a boat trip to Hawaii, facing challenges and exploring the sea with a diverse group.
20:46 Sailing journey encounters challenges, traditions, and personal dynamics among diverse crew members.
31:02 Adventure and drama unfold as a young man embarks on a solo sailing journey towards Stanford acceptance.
43:29 A dramatic journey unfolds as unexpected events lead to a life-threatening situation on a boat.
55:24 Adventure unfolds as two sailors navigate challenges and unexpected encounters during their voyage.
1:09:38 Journey of determination and resilience in the face of challenges and adversity.


@CultCinemaClassics
